content.raw:
Also related to https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issue/309/use-of-visual-model-instead-of-collision

The golf cart is just a proof of concept vehicle, more effort should be put into getting the Polaris Ranger up and running - a first release was promised for before Christmas but other than the static Ranger model we haven't received anything so far.
content.html:
Also related to https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issue/309/use-of-visual-model-instead-of-collision

The golf cart is just a proof of concept vehicle, more effort should be put into getting the Polaris Ranger up and running - a first release was promised for before Christmas but other than the static Ranger model we haven't received anything so far.
